Class Money_UpdateMsg

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Messages.NetworkMessages.NetworkMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Messages.NetworkMessages.Money_UpdateMsg
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Money_UpdateMsg extends NetworkMessage
Message sent everytime the quantity of money on the general money reserve changes.

    • Money_UpdateMsg

      public Money_UpdateMsg(MessageType messageType, int playerID, int money, int generalMoneyReserve)
      Money_UpdateMsg constructor.
      Parameters:
      messageType - it will be MONEY_UPDATE.
      playerID - ID of the player that got his money changed.
      money - number of money of the player now.
      generalMoneyReserve - general money reserve updated number of money.
